description: An array of content elements extracted from a document.

element_id.description: A unique identifier for the content element.

metadata.description: A collection of metadata associated with the element.

coordinates.description: Positional information of the element on the page.

points.description: An array of [x, y] coordinate pairs defining the bounding box.

detection_class_prob.description: Optional: Confidence score from the detection model.

file_directory.description: The directory where the source file is located.

filename.description: The name of the source file.

filetype.description: The MIME type of the source file.

image_path.description: Optional: The file path to an image representation of the element.

languages.description: A list of languages detected in the element's text.

last_modified.description: The last modification date and time of the source file.

page_number.description: The page number where the element appears.

parent_id.description: Optional: The element_id of a parent element.

links.description: Optional: A list of hyperlinks found within the element's text.

text.description: The text content of the element.

type.description: The classified type of the element (e.g., 'Image', 'Title', 'NarrativeText').
